distributionId.title: Distribution ID
distributionId.description: The ID of the MAGDA distribution referred to by this catalog item.  Either this propertyor {@see MagdaCatalogItem#datasetId} must be specified.  If {@see MagdaCatalogItem#datasetId} isspecified too, and this distribution is not found, _any_ supported distribution may be used instead,depending on the value of {@see MagdaCatalogItem#allowAnyDistributionIfDistributionIdNotFound}.

datasetId.title: Dataset ID
datasetId.description: The ID of the MAGDA dataset referred to by this catalog item.  Either this propertyis {@see MagdaCatalogItem#distributionId} must be specified.  The first distribution of a supported typein this dataset will be used.

allowAnyDistributionIfDistributionIdNotF.title: Allow any distribution if distribution ID not found
allowAnyDistributionIfDistributionIdNotF.description: A value indicating whether any supported distribution may be used if both {@see MagdaCatalogItem#datasetId} and{@see MagdaCatalogItem#distributionId} are specified and the {@see MagdaCatalogItem#distributionId} is not found.

allowWms.title: Allow WMS
allowWms.description: A value indicating whether this may be a WMS distribution.

allowWfs.title: Allow WFS
allowWfs.description: A value indicating whether this may be a WFS distribution.

allowKml.title: Allow KML
allowKml.description: A value indicating whether this may be a KML distribution.

allowCsv.title: Allow CSV
allowCsv.description: A value indicating whether this may be a CSV distribution.

allowEsriMapServer.title: Allow esri map server
allowEsriMapServer.description: A value indicating whether this may be an Esri MapServer distribution.

allowEsriFeatureServer.title: Allow esri feature server
allowEsriFeatureServer.description: A value indicating whether this may be an Esri FeatureServer distribution.

allowGeoJson.title: Allow geo JSON
allowGeoJson.description: A value indicating whether this may be a GeoJSON distribution.

allowCzml.title: Allow CZML
allowCzml.description: A value indicating whether this may be a CZML distribution.

itemProperties.title: Item properties
itemProperties.description: A hash of properties that will be set on the item created from the MAGDA distribution.For example, { "treat404AsError": false }
